Line: She thinks I'm a nice guy. Women always think I'm nice, but women don't like nice.
This is amazing, I haven't seen one guy going in to that restaurant since it opened. Poor guy.
Why is nice bad? What kind of sick society we are living in, when nice is bad?
What's that smell? What are you wearing?
Monica wants me to wear it.
So why didn't you say no?
Poor guy. His family is probably in Pakistan waiting him to send back money. This is horrible.
She wants me to take an IQ test.
That's because you're stupid enough to wear the cologne.
No, she's taking this course in education for her masters. It's part of her research project, I have to be a guinea pig.
I've never been a guinea pig. I've been a sheep, a tody.
You know, I can't talk to you anymore.
All right, I'm sorry. Go ahead, you're taking the IQ test.
Yeah, and she's going to find I'm a moron. You know, people think I'm smart, but I'm not smart.
I'm not going to break a hundred in this thing.
You don't listen when people talk to you anymore!
I'm sure I have a low IQ. I've been lying about my SAT scores for 15 years.
What did I get or what do I say I got?
Well, this I take to the grave.
He's serving Mexican ,Italian, Chinese. He's all over the place. That's why no one is going in.
I don't know, I'm obsessed with it. It's like a spider in the toilet struggling for a survival. And even if you know it's not going to make it, you kind of root it for awhile.
You know, sometimes people won't go in to a place, if they don't see anyone else in there.
You have to do that? Jerry, don't do that, that is so annoying.
My house? You have to be on the lease to press to buzzer. Yeah?
It's Latin. I read it in some book. I don't know, I just wanted to say it out loud.
No, I'm afraid if we start talking, I'm gonna wind up going partners with him.
You know, I could probably shoot him from here. I'd be doing us both a favor.
I'm wearing some cologne, all right?
Since when do you wear cologne?
Why what I do is so important? Why must I be always the vocal point of attention? Let me just be, let me live.
Hey, how did you do on that IQ test?
Why must you always be the vocal point of attention? Why can't you just be? Why can't you live?
It's just a Latin phrase George, it does not mean anything. Now, what is this test?
This woman he's dating is making him to take this IQ test for this course.
Yeah, fun. IQ tests are totally bogus. They prove nothing.
No see, he's not smart. People think he's smart, but he's not.
What did you get on your SAT's?
You know, I don't even know my IQ.
You should take the test for me.
Well, that would be something, cheating on a IQ test. Hey, remember in college when you passed Lettick the test out the window? You became a legend after that.
Yeah, yeah I really had some guts back then. Why wouldn't we do that again?
You could take the IQ test for me. I could pass it to you out the window. We could do it, she lives in the first floor.
Where would I take the test?
I don't know, she lives right around the corner. Take it here or go to the coffee shop.
No, that would be too noisy.
Take it to Dream Cafe, you won't hear a peep.
Hey, I love a good caper.
Yeah, that's what is is, a caper.
Well, I've been looking forward to it.
Oh, how did you hear about us?
Smoking or non smoking? We are proud to offer both.
Very good. My name is Babu Bhatt, I will be your waiter. A steaming hot face cloth for your pleasure.
Our specials are tacos, moussaka and franks and beans.
Well, what do you recommend my good fellow?
Oh, the turkey it'll be. And may I say you have a splendid establishment here , my friend. I'm sure you flourish in this location for many many years.
You're a very kind man. Very kind, thank you. Very kind...

Very kind. I am a kind man. Who else would do something like this? Nobody. Nobody thinks about people like I do. All right, snap out of it you stupid jerk. You're eating a turkey sandwich. What do want, a nobel price?
You go in the living room. I'll take the test in here.
I can't concentrate in front of you.
Oh, I think you're making too much of this. IQ tests don't mean anything.
Are you kidding me? This is the best tool we have today of measuring a persons intelligence.
Well, I certainly don't place any importance on it.
Well, I think you're wrong about that. And now if you would excuse me, I would like to get started please.
What's been going on in there? I've been standing here for 20 minutes.
I'm sorry I'm sorry, here's the test. Thanks again for doing this.
All right, what time do you want me back here.
And don't settle for 145, you can do better, you're a genius.
Thank you Babu. You have quite a flair. You are quite the restaurateur I must say.
It is in deed my pleasure.
Oh, welcome to the Dream Cafe. Our specials today...
Oh, no no I'll just have a tea and toast.
Um, ok, I'll have the rigatoni.
Oh, very good choice. Very good.
Oh wow, so you got the test. You're cheating.
Oh boy. Jerry let me ask you something, hi Elaine...
This guy leaves this jacket at my mothers house two years ago. Now, she hasn't spoken to him since and now he says he wants the jacket back.
Well, I'm not giving it back.
Because I meat a lot of women in this jacket, you know they're attracted to it. Why do you think my mother went out with him?
Anyway, it's been two years. I mean isn't there like statue of limitations on that?
Statute of limitations. It's not a statue.
Fine, it's a sculpture of limitations.
Just wait a minute...Elaine, Elaine! Now you're smart, is it statue or statute of limitations?
Oh, I really think you're wrong.
Look, Kramer, I have to take this test ok, I don't have a long of time.
Why do you take an IQ test?
Yeah, can I...can I explain it to you later?
Why are you taking an IQ test for George?
What, is it for a job or something?
Welcome, welcome. A steaming hot face cloth...
Monica, I'm really focused here, this stuff's a killer.
Oh my God! It's all over the test!
Oh man! Look at this...and I'm late anyway.
Go ahead, I'll take care of it.
I'm very sorry. Tell your friends!
It's all right, she was cheating anyway.
Of course, you're a very smart man, I'll listen.
I'm not a restaurateur by any means, but it occurred to me that perhaps you might serve some dishes from your native Pakistan? As opposed to franks and beans for example.
But there are no Pakistani people here.
Doesn't matter. You would have the only authentic Pakistani restaurant in the whole neighborhood.
Yes, you see everything, don't you?
Well, not everything. I do what I can.
I'll close down today and when I open again it'll be whole Pakistani restaurant. Thank you, thank you very much, you're very special person, very special.
I am such a great guy. Who else would've gone through the trouble of helping this poor immigrant? I am special. My mother was right. Of course I've never had Pakistani food. How bad it could be?
What did you go on a picnic?
Babu Bhatt? How I'm going to explain this?
What? I spilled some food on it.
I eh, I had a sandwich in my pocket.
Where did you get the coffee?
Where did I get the coffee? Where do think I got the coffee, from the grocery store.
How did you get out of the apartment? I didn't see you leave.
Why didn't you go out the door?
The door? Why would I go out the door? The window is right here.
You are a fascinating man, George Costanza.
Most people in a situation like this, they walk right by it. Not me.
Hey, do me a favor. If some guy comes in looking for me, tell him you don't know where I am.
No, no it's that guy. He's really been bugging me about the jacket.
Just give it back to him.
Oh, he'll have to kill me.
How did you do on the IQ test?!
Well, I'm no genius, but according to my calculations he should be here in a few seconds.
Well, maybe the test was gender bias, you know a lot of questions about hunting and testicles...
No there has got be a mistake.
You should've seen her face. It was the exact same look my father gave me when I told him I wanted to be a ventriloquist.
There were too many distractions there. Babu...what ever he's name was and Kramer...I couldn't concentrate.
Jerry! It was! Let me take it again.
Oh, come on, come on. I guarantee 140. What do you have to lose?
Ok, now where I'm going to take it.
Take it here, I'll leave, there'll be no distractions.
Well, congratulations my friend. You know, I sorry I missed the grand re-opening. I was out of town for about a week.
You see how I listened. I worked very hard, borrowed more money.
I think it's fantastic. Has a certain indefinable charm.
Let me tell you something Babu. You go back there in that kitchen and tell your chef I want the works.
Very good? No, not very good, very great. I am very, very great.
Hey, Kramer! I saw you going there! I'm not leaving until I get the jacket. Open up Kramer!
Why did you come in here for?
I thought I'd throw him off. See, he knows where I live.
Well Kramer, I have to return this test. I've got to get out of here.
I thought you took the test.
I had to take it again.
Come on, Kramer! I want that jacket back!
You know, it's the damnedest thing. I went out the window again to get a cup of coffee...
Babu? Babu... Babu...you know, I got to tell you, I never do this, but the shrimp, it's just that it's a little stringy. You have any chicken?

Quiet!! You shut up! You make me change restaurant, but nobody comes! You say make Pakistani, Babu Bhatt have only Pakistani restaurant. But where are people? You see people? Show me people. There are no people!
You know, I think I'll just take the check.
You bad man! You very very bad man!
Bad man? Could've my mother been wrong?
Thanks. I hope you did do a lot better this time.
Actually, you know what, I think I did. The first time I couldn't really cons......entreat.
You know what it was, bad location.
Lets not stand here, we might run in to her.
Aren't you cold? Where's your jacket?
Hey guys, I just ran in to Monica. You know what my IQ is? 151.
So, what are you up for? How about Mexican?
You know, what would be great?
